A

actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class MainMenu
Controls both when the button to change the phrase match length is pressed, setting it to the correct amount if it is an integer, and controls when a button is pressed in the file pair tables, opening the submenu of the correlating file pair to the button (matching the text of the button)
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class SubMenu
Accepts the input of the text field via the confirm button, repainting the frame to show the frequencies of the word currently input in the text field

C

cleanWordList() - Method in class WordList
Creates a list based on the raw parsed text from the document to remove all punctuation (aside from mid word hyphens) and turning it to lower case

F

findWordCount(String) - Method in class WordList
Returns the count of a word in the frequency word list (0 if not in the list)

G

getAlteredListLength() - Method in class WordList
Returns the length of the list containing the altered parsed text
getAlteredListPos(int) - Method in class WordList
Returns the ParaWord at the provided index in the list containing the altered parsed text
getChecked() - Method in class ParaWord
Returns the checked value of this instance
getCount() - Method in class IndivWordFreq
Returns the count value of this instance
getFrequencyListLength() - Method in class WordList
Returns the length of the list containing the frequency of each unique word
getFrequencyListPos(int) - Method in class WordList
Returns the IndivWordFreq at the provided index in the list containing the frequency of each unique word
getHighlighted() - Method in class ParaWord
Returns the highlighted value of this instance
getInQuotes() - Method in class ParaWord
Returns the boolean of whether this word is in quotes
getUnalteredListLength() - Method in class WordList
Returns the length of the list containing the unaltered parsed text
getUnalteredListPos(int) - Method in class WordList
Returns the string at the provided index in the list containing the unaltered parsed text
getWord() - Method in class IndivWordFreq
Returns the word stored in this instance
getWord() - Method in class ParaWord
Returns the word stored in this instance
getWordCount() - Method in class WordList
Returns the word count of the file stored in this list (that aren't contained within quotation marks)

I

incrementCount() - Method in class IndivWordFreq
Increases the count of this instance by one
IndivWordFreq - Class in Unnamed Package
This class is used for counting how many times a word appears in a file.
IndivWordFreq(String) - Constructor for class IndivWordFreq
Creates a new IndivWordFreq instance storing the word and the count, set to 1 at the start

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class PlagiarismChecker
 
MainMenu - Class in Unnamed Package
Prints out the main menu with an introductory text, a text field to set the minimu phrase length for phrase matching with button to set it, the phrase match percentages of every pair of files and the top 4 highest phrase match percentages
MainMenu(String) - Constructor for class MainMenu
Main method of the main menu, which sets up the arrays and adds all the elements to the main frame / panel, and sets up the file path variable for use in phrase matching
MatchFunction() - Method in class PhraseMatcher
Finds the phrase match percentage by finding every phrase equal to or larger in length to the minimu phrase length variable and adding up very word within them, and then dividing that by the number of words in the first file and multiplied by 100 to get the phrase match percentage of the first file compared to the second

P

ParaWord - Class in Unnamed Package
This class is used for both counting words and phrase matching.
ParaWord(String, boolean) - Constructor for class ParaWord
This creates a new instance of the ParaWord class, setting both checked and highlighted to their default false state
PhraseMatcher - Class in Unnamed Package
This class finds the percentage phrase match between 2 given files
PhraseMatcher(WordList, WordList, int) - Constructor for class PhraseMatcher
Sets up the phrase matcher, by getting the file names and minimum phrase length
PlagiarismChecker - Class in Unnamed Package
Driver class of the program that finds the file path of the folder the texts are in and calls the main menu
PlagiarismChecker() - Constructor for class PlagiarismChecker
 

S

Sets the checked value of this instance

Sets the highlighted value of this instance

Sets the boolean of whether this word is in quotes
SubMenu - Class in Unnamed Package
This class is for printing the sub menu of a pair of files.
SubMenu(int, int, String, int) - Constructor for class SubMenu
Main function to produce the submenu, setting up the files and frame elements for display

W

wordFrequencyCounter(boolean) - Method in class WordList
Creates the list for the word frequency counter, looping through the list of altered words and checking that word against every other word in the list, counting each time that word appears and marking them as checked for future loops through the text, resulting in a list with the number of times each unique word appears.
WordList - Class in Unnamed Package
This class stored and uses the text from the text files entered into the checker.
WordList(String) - Constructor for class WordList
Creates an instance of the WordList class, taking in a filename, reading the file and parsing the raw text into a list
